name: The Exit 2
description:
Part 2, Final

The story of a guy who made a fatal decision. For some people, there is no atonement for sins because they cannot change themselves. 

No checkpoints. Dont forget to save your game!

Windows 7 is recommended.

Probably the game crashes at levels 3-4. Restart the game and try again.

If the number of ammo is not visible, remove the weapon by 0 and take by 1.

Sorry for bad translation.
